feed.title: This Strange World
feed.subtitle: The world is a strange place. From creepy conspiracy theories, to weird laws, to terrifying cults, this podcast explores them all. Each week, one of our hosts takes a deep dive into a strange, weird, and random topic, and discusses what they found with the other hosts.

author.name: Gavin Berger, Leah Ettinger, and Chris Ashe

entry.title: Introducing This Strange World - Season 1 Episode 0

link.title: Introducing This Strange World - Season 1 Episode 0

entry.content: Gavin, Leah, and Chris begin their journey to make sense of This Strange World.
